alert.note: Alert for Adair; Cherokee; Delaware (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 17 at 7:11PM CST until December 19 at 12:16PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tulsa OK has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Illinois River at Chewey affecting Adair, Cherokee and Delaware Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Illinois River at Chewey. * WHEN...From Saturday morning to early Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, moderate flooding occurs from near Fidler`s Bend to near Hanging Rock. Moderate flooding of agricultural lands may result in livestock issues. Travel around Hanging Rock is impacted. Road access near the river is cut off to residential homes southeast of Chewey Bridge. Access to Winset Hollow is cut off. A few cabins in the Fidler`s Bend area may have minor flooding. Extreme turbulence makes the river too hazardous for floating. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 PM CST Friday the stage was 5.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Saturday morning to a crest of 14.5 feet Saturday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
